name: Corridors (Ghost_wave)
description:
Game description:

As you wake up, you find yourself in a strange place... "endless corridors" you mutter to yourself. Dim lights, humid walls, and, as if that weren't enough, it seems you're not alone.

Hurry, stand up, grab your rifle and try to delay your inevitable doom!

Made for Ludum Dare 50

Dev note:

Didn't have a lot of time to make this as I was only available on Sunday (so only 24h). I hope you still enjoy the game, I could have pushed it a bit further but I'm still happy with where it's at.

This is actually my first time trying to make a 3D game, I learned blender last month (you can find my beginner donut hidden somewhere).

I actually started by working on the music, I like it a lot even if it's very messy.

Textures are just from pictures of random objects in my apartment.

What took the most amount of time was setting up the monster behaviour.

Modelling and animating as I'm a noob in this area.

and polishing the player controller.
